Config

Environment Module

Helper functions for environment variables.

config.environment.demand_env_var(name: str) → str

Returns an environment variable as a string, or throws an exception.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

The environment variables value as a string.

config.environment.demand_env_var_as_bool(name: str) → bool

Returns an environment variable as a bool, or throws an exception.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

The environment variables value as a bool.

config.environment.demand_env_var_as_float(name: str) → float

Returns an environment variable as a float, or throws an exception.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

The environment variables value as a float.

config.environment.demand_env_var_as_int(name: str) → int

Returns an environment variable as an int, or throws an exception.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

The environment variables value as an int.

config.environment.get_env_var(name: str) → Optional[str]

Returns an environment variable as a string, otherwise None if it does not exist.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the environment variable.

Return type

The environment variables value as a string, or None if it does not exist.

EnvironmentVariableNotFoundError Module

Environment Variable Not Found Error Definition

exception config.environment_variable_not_found_error.EnvironmentVariableNotFoundError

Bases: Exception

Environment Variable Not Found Error
